ProductInfo.Features:
FREE Wide Screen LED Monitor, FREE Power Box, & FREE 500 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable Included In The Package.
12 Cameras:  1/3" CMOS Outdoor Camera, 650 TV lines, 3.6mm Lens, 24 IR LEDs, 65 ft IR Distance. Low Illumination 0.1 Lux. Metal vandal proof & water proof
16 Channel DVR with 2TB HDD: H.264 960H & D1, 960×480 & 30FPS Real time Recording, Supports HDMI & VGA Outputs.
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control.
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support.
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End Value CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 16 Channel DVR 2TB HDD 960H & D1 30FPS Real-Time Recording, 12 Outdoor/Indoor Cameras 650 TVL 24 IR LEDs, iPhone Android Viewable
